room_title: Escape room "Toymaker Workshop" by Zoya Escape Rooms in St. Joseph (MI)
room_address: 4298 S Niles Rd, St Joseph, MI 49085
room_description: The Toymaker Workshop has been taken over by Robots! Recently the enigmatic toymaker tried to save money by automating his workshop, but something happened and the machines are out of control! Instead of innocent toys it is building an army to take over the world! Your team are the only people who can reprogram the workshop before its too late!
